item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
Pretty good, I'm running 5 VMs over there now with pretty good performance, 4 of them are 1 CPU, 512M mem, and 10G disk, working as Cassandra server, and the 5th is 1 CPU, 256M mem, 10G disk which running as LVS director.
Looks good :P
item.content:encoded:
Pretty good, I’m running 5 VMs over there now with pretty good performance, 4 of them are 1 CPU, 512M mem, and 10G disk, working as Cassandra server, and the 5th is 1 CPU, 256M mem, 10G disk which running as LVS director.

Looks good ðŸ˜›

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: I installed proxmox and things are running well so far, I will leave it running there for some time for some days before checking back.
item.content:encoded: I installed proxmox and things are running well so far, I will leave it running there for some time for some days before checking back.
